title: Lol_air_client
body: I have no lol_air_client folder which I need to restore some things to my profile. I just want to know how to fix this and yes I've tried most methods on the internet including uninstalling and repairing. I used to have lol_air_client but then I uninstalled the game for some reasons and now its gone. How do I get it back?

replies.body:
Hey there,

The LoL Air Client no longer exists (In the sense that it's deprecated) and has been superseded by the new client (League Client Update) which is currently in beta, this is why you are no longer able to locate the lol_air_client folder.

What do you need to restore that you cannot accomplish via the new client?

Censorship. Mine is permanently stuck on when I have it deactivated and the trick use to be to go into the lol-air-client and tinker with a notepad and set it from 0 to 1 or 1 to 0 but it seems that no longer possible

This can be enabled or disabled from the new clients options menu under 'Chat & Friends'

http://puu.sh/t9zJ5/013bd57375.png
